title: Talbiyah Hajj Umrah
description: Authentic supplications for Talbiyah Hajj Umrah
seoContent: Authentic invocations and supplications for Talbiyah Hajj Umrah. Derived from reliable sources including Hisnul Muslim.

items.title: Dua 233
items.arabic: ((لَبَّيْكَ اللَّهُمَّ لَبَّيْكَ، لَبَّيْكَ لاَ شَرِيكَ لَكَ لَبَّيْكَ، إِنَّ الْحَمْدَ، وَالنِّعْمَةَ، لَكَ وَالْمُلْكَ، لاَ شَرِيكَ لَكَ)).
items.transliteration: Labbaykal-lahumma labbayk, labbayka la shareeka laka labbayk, innal-hamda wanniAAmata laka walmulk, la shareeka lak.
items.translation: Here I am O Allah, (in response to Your call), here I am. Here I am, You have no partner, here I am.  Verily all praise, grace and sovereignty belong to You. You have no partner.
